Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aspergillus flavus(MIC=10µM),Candida albicans(MIC=5µM),Malassezia furfur(MIC=1.25µM),Trichosporon beigelii(MIC=5µM),Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=2-4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=8-16µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=2-4µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=2-4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=1-2µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=2-4µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3089(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3114(MIC=8µM),Salmonella typhimurium CCARM 8003(MIC=4µM),Salmonella typhimurium CCARM 8007(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli CCARM 1229(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 100(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>100µM)
